text: Black Gull () is a 1962 Soviet adventure film directed by Grigoriy Koltunov.Легендарная танцовщица Манана Абазадзе станет обладательницей именной звездыАфиша Петербурга: вечер с Кустурицей, фестиваль «Площадь искусств» и новый альбом «Сплина» == Plot == The film takes place in Cuba after the revolution, in a fishing village by the sea. The United States is still trying to return the old regime and send sabotage groups there. The film tells about a group of guys in whose eyes this is happening.Черная чайка == Cast == * Anatoliy Adoskin * Saida Dadasheva as Panchita * Igor Dmitriev * Dzheikhun Dzhamal as Manolo * Aleksei Loktev * Anatoliy Podshivalov as Sardinka * Viktoriya Vika as Silviya * Sergey YurskiyЭкспромт для вечностиЧерная чайка (1962) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet adventure films Category:Soviet films
title: Black Gull
